entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
